misconceptions.inferred_category_name: No misconception detected (correct loop-nesting and bounds)
misconceptions.student_thought_process: The student believes that using a nested loop where the outer loop controls the row number (1..N) and the inner loop prints that many asterisks per row will produce the required right-triangle pattern.
misconceptions.conceptual_gap: No gap detected. This matches Java’s execution model: the outer loop iterates N times, and for each iteration the inner loop prints exactly i asterisks, then a newline.
misconceptions.error_manifestation: None; output matches the specification for positive N.
